statements: SELECT * FROM space_missions;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM space_missions WHERE destination='Moon';
SELECT * FROM space_missions WHERE mission_status='In Progress';
SELECT mission_id, mission_name FROM space_missions ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_missions FROM space_missions WHERE destination='Mars';
SELECT * FROM space_missions WHERE mission_status = 'Planned' ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT mission_name, destination FROM space_missions WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01' LIMIT 5;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, destination FROM space_missions WHERE destination IN ('Moon', 'Mars', 'Jupiter') ORDER BY mission_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_missions FROM space_missions WHERE mission_status = 'Completed';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, mission_status FROM space_missions WHERE launch_date < NOW() AND mission_status <> 'Cancelled';
SELECT * FROM SpaceMissions;
SELECT mission_name, launch_site, destination FROM SpaceMissions;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM SpaceMissions ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT task_title, task_description, task_due_date FROM MissionTasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT mission_name, launch_site, destination FROM SpaceMissions WHERE launch_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SpaceMissions WHERE destination = 'Moon';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM SpaceMissions ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT mission_name, launch_site FROM SpaceMissions WHERE launch_site = 'Kennedy Space Center';
SELECT t.task_title, t.task_due_date, m.mission_name FROM MissionTasks t INNER JOIN SpaceMissions m ON t.mission_id = m.mission_id WHERE t.task_due_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT m.mission_name, t.task_title, t.task_status FROM SpaceMissions m LEFT JOIN MissionTasks t ON m.mission_id = t.mission_id ORDER BY m.mission_name ASC, t.task_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM missions;
SELECT mission_name, destination FROM missions;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, launch_date FROM missions WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM astronauts WHERE age < 30;
SELECT mission_id, COUNT(task_id) AS total_tasks FROM tasks GROUP BY mission_id;
SELECT * FROM missions;
SELECT mission_name, destination FROM missions WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, launch_date FROM missions ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM astronauts WHERE age > 30 AND nationality = 'USA';
SELECT mission_name, task_description, completion_date FROM missions JOIN tasks ON missions.mission_id = tasks.mission_id;
SELECT * FROM missions;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, destination FROM missions;
SELECT astronaut_name, nationality FROM astronauts;
SELECT spacecraft_name, launch_vehicle FROM spacecrafts;
SELECT timeline_id, event_description, event_date FROM mission_timeline;
SELECT mission_name, destination FROM missions;
SELECT astronaut_name, nationality FROM astronauts WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM missions WHERE launch_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT spacecraft_name, launch_vehicle FROM spacecrafts ORDER BY launch_vehicle DESC;
SELECT event_description, event_date FROM mission_timeline WHERE mission_id = 1 ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM mission_schedule;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM mission_schedule WHERE mission_id = 1;
SELECT crew_name, role FROM mission_crew WHERE mission_id = 2;
SELECT site_name, location FROM launch_site ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT craft_name, status FROM spacecraft WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, arrival_date FROM mission_schedule WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT craft_name, status FROM spacecraft WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT site_name, location FROM launch_site ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT crew_name, role FROM mission_crew WHERE mission_id = 3;
SELECT task_description, task_status FROM mission_tasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY task_id DESC;
